## Bee.downloadChunk() method

Download chunk as a byte array

**Signature:**

```typescript
downloadChunk(reference: Reference | Uint8Array | string, options?: DownloadOptions, requestOptions?: BeeRequestOptions): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```
